#summary The area shape attribute specifies the shape of an area in a client-side image map.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [AreaElement <area> element] > *shape attribute*

== Usage ==

See [AreaCoordsAttribute <area coords>] for usage information and examples.

== Elements ==

You can use the `shape` attribute on the following elements:

  * [AElement <a>]
  * [AreaElement <area>]
